## Limited Run Artesian Pinot Noir
Our reserve is a Pinot Noir blend of 50% Holmes Gap & 50% Quailhurst Vineyards. Handpicked by our winemaker from the best two barrels produced by each vineyard in 2021, our cellars bottled only 50 cases of this limited-production vintage. (Available late 2023)  
ALC/VOL 14.3%
$65.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
